name: Wan Wan Gikan
description:
This is a student project developed in the alternative game development class at the University of Utah.

HOW TO PLAY

Left / Right = A/D 

Jump = W

Kick = J

Dash (ATK) = K

Bomb = L

Invicible = ;

Space / Enter = continue text

CREDITS

Programmers:   Nate Merrill & Justina Wunderlich

UI Artist:  Kalvan Sears

Animator and Designer: Connor Workman

Asset Artist: Walter Talley
